name: A Spell of Rain
description:
A SPELL OF RAIN
A Leap-Motion Compatible Spelling Game

Final project coded in Processing designed as an education game and learning tool for kids. Playable with both a mouse and motion controls (using a Leap device).

Catch the falling raindrops to spell out the word the center image is trying to indicate. To check if you are correct, move your bucket to the right. If you are correct, the image will change to the next word. To clear your word, move to the left. Your bucket will "empty" as a result.

Words are dynamically generated through an external excel sheet. Words can be added, deleted, and edited as long as there is a corresponding image with the same file name.

Game documentation can be found here.
